name: Sage Clary Essential Oil
description:
DescriptionClary Sage is a beautiful earthy and herbaceous oil with a hint of floral. It calms and balances the spirit. Clary sage is considered to be a sedating oil, and it reduces stress and brings on a feeling of tranquility. It is especially balancing on female hormones and can be used to treat PMS, menstrual cramps, postnatal depression, menopause and irregular cycles. It combines well with jasmine, geranium, lavender, bergamot, orange, ylang ylang, rosewood, rose, sandalwood and chamomile.
Do not use when pregnant. Due to its sedating properties, avoid use of clary sage while driving or drinking.
For easy diffusion of your essential oils, browse our range of diffusers.
